gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all issue type schemes available in Jira so that I can understand the different configurations that can be applied to my projects.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all issue type schemes with their IDs, names, and descriptions.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new issue type scheme to better organize the issue types for my projects.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a JSON payload with the scheme details and return the newly created issue type scheme's ID and details.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to get the mapping of issue type schemes to projects to ensure that the correct issue types are available for each project.
gold.ideal: The API should return a mapping of project IDs to their corresponding issue type scheme IDs.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to find out which issue type scheme is assigned to my project to ensure that the right issue types are being used.
gold.ideal: The API should return the issue type scheme ID and details for the specified project.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I need to assign an issue type scheme to my project to customize the issue types available for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a project ID and an issue type scheme ID, and confirm the assignment with a success message.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to delete an unused issue type scheme to keep the system organized and reduce clutter.
gold.ideal: The API should delete the specified issue type scheme and return a confirmation message.

gold.user: As a project manager, I need to update the details of an existing issue type scheme to reflect changes in our project requirements.
gold.ideal: The API should accept updated details for the issue type scheme and return the updated scheme's information.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I want to add new issue types to an existing issue type scheme to expand the options available for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a list of issue type IDs to be added and return the updated issue type scheme details.

gold.user: As a project manager, I need to reorder the issue types in an issue type scheme to prioritize certain types for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a new order for the issue types and return the updated order confirmation.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to remove an issue type from an issue type scheme that is no longer needed to streamline our processes.
gold.ideal: The API should delete the specified issue type from the scheme and return a confirmation message.
